segments.text: It's very nice of you to invite me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm very glad you could come , Mr . Liu . Will you take a seat at the head of the table ? It's an informal dinner , please don't stand on ceremony ... Mr . Liu , would you like to have some chicken ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . This is my first time to come to a Chinese restaurant . Could you tell me the different features of Chinese food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Generally speaking , Cantonese food is a bit light ; Shanghai food is rather oily ; and Hunan dishes are very spicy , having a strong and hot taste .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Chinese dishes are exquisitely prepared , delicious , and very palatable . They are very good in colour , flavour , and taste .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Liu , would you care for another helping ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No more , thank you . I'm quite full .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's the most delicious dinner I've had for a long time . It's such a rich dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so glad you like it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much for your hospitality .
segments.speaker: S1
